name: Stasher Reusable Pocket Bag (2 Pack)
description: Plastic bags are convenient for you, but not great for the planet and its ocean life. These reusable bags seal easily, uses food grade silicone and are dishwasher safe.Food grade silicone is easy to clean and won't transfer taste.Airtight pinch and press seal keeps food fresh.Dimensions: 8 x 10cm.Top-rack dishwasher safe.
